# Golden Horse Audience Choice Award

}}
The Golden Horse Audience Choice Award () is an out-of-competition award presented annually at the Golden Horse Awards by the Taipei Golden Horse Film Festival Executive Committee. The award is determined by votes of selected audience from the nominated films of Best Narrative Feature. The winner is announced and presented at Nominee Party on the eve of the Awards Ceremony. As of the 2024 Golden Horse Awards, Bel Ami, directed by Geng Jun, won the award.
